programme.title: STEAL MY HEART
programme.desc: Hot-shot police detective Lee is out to get a hit-and-run driver and discovers the driver is his long-lost girlfriend from ten years ago. He tries to protect her before her crime record accumulates.

programme.title: HARBIN
programme.desc: In 1908, Ahn Jung-geun and Korean independence fighters win against Japanese army. A year later, they head to Harbin as the Japanese statesman Uto Hirobumi is going for negotiation...

programme.title: THE KING'S LETTERS
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: ONE WIN
programme.desc: Woo-jin is the newly appointed manager of a girls' volleyball team which is going to disband. The new owner sold all ace players for money and asked the team to win at least once.

programme.title: MARRIAGE BLUE
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: OFFICE
programme.desc: The investigation following a sales manager brutally killing his entire family leads to a track of mystery and tragedy in an overwhelmed work team at Seoul.

programme.title: THE DEVIL'S DEAL
programme.desc: A national assembly candidate, a hidden politics powerhouse and a gangster rivals for a top secret document that will shake the nation's core.

programme.title: GYEONG-AH'S DAUGHTER
programme.desc: After her husband passed away, Gyeong-ah relies on her daughter Yeon-su. But they barely meet each other. One day, Gyeong-ah gets an anonymous message about Yeon-su and goes into trauma...

programme.title: THE ASSASSIN
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: MR. ZOO: THE MISSING VIP
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to handle a case that has gone sideways.

programme.title: THE MAGICIAN
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: BEAR MAN
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: THE NEGOTIATION
programme.desc: An arms dealer kidnapped two Koreans in Bangkok where the hostages were in fact held in an abandoned children's home in South Korea, when the kidnapper's motivations becomes clearer.

programme.title: RACE TO FREEDOM: UM BOK DONG
programme.desc: K-pop star Rain portrays Um Bok-dong, an unlikely hero in a government-organized bicycle race during the Japanese colonial era. Defeating Japanese rivals, his victories inspire locals and resistance fighters.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom hatches an unorthodox plan to use a monstrous Nightmare to test Alex’s new fire suits that endangers the secret of dragons.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where the knowledge of myths saves the day.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex has to decide between her moms’ excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Phil invents a simple new game called ball-in-cup, everyone except Hope, can't stop playing it. But just when Hope thinks she's rid the farm of the game, she finds herself addicted to the game worst of all.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Grug thinks his forehead looks too big in Ugga's family portrait, she strives to make the painting disappear.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young “cloaking” dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it’s revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When the Eruptodon can't take its egg into the Great Volcano, Hiccup and Fishlegs must go into the dangerous volcano with the egg before it's too late.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When the Twins journey to the Northern Markets to fix their prized mace, they end up stumbling onto a secret project by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
programme.desc: Keith is sent on a mission to destroy a weapon before Galra forces can find it

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Lerk and Thunk hide all the valley's worms in a cave to protect them from the hunters who want to use them as bait; Grug invents the spear and pitches it to the Valley as a tool that will change cavemanity forever!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Click-Clack climbs out of his comfort zone to make sure his ideas are heard when the Dinotrux hatch a plan to stop D-Structs from stealing supplies.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: All the animals are having a nap. But Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo aren't tired and want to play… will they have enough energy to last until everyone else wakes up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is determined that he can copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle… until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just can't whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy is having a party and Raa Raa is helping organise the games. But not everybody is good at them. Can Raa Raa and his friends come up with new games that all the friends are good at and enjoy?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is sure he has found the perfect present for each of his friends… but what happens if the packages get mixed up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is playing a game - copying everyone in the jungle. He soon distracts his friends… but can he put the game to good use?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch can’t keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scooch’s race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil’s perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.desc: This episode explores how nature’s toughest animals have adapted to the extreme conditions in some of the planet’s most inhospitable environments.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: In this episode we explore animal communication and reveal the incredible adaptations that enable animals to ‘talk’ to each other.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Examining nature’s most sociable animals, unveiling the surprising and incredible behaviours that have evolved in response to cohabitation.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Showcasing some of nature’s most incredible animal minds, whose brains demonstrate high intelligence, enabling them to gain advantage of their competition.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: In this episode we explore why and how animals fight and reveal the ways in which they are programmed to survive at all costs.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: This episode follows the journeys of these magnificent humpbacks, from their feeding grounds to their breeding grounds, the tender moments between mother and calf, and see the dangers their calves face in their first few months, including incredible interactions with predatory killer whales. The humpbacks also face a world full of human threats, from large container ships, to the impact of seismic testing in the search for oil and gas, now threatening their very survival once more.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: Often referred to as the dinosaur fish, the coelacanth occupies a unique place in the fossil record, and when it was rediscovered almost a century ago it shook the scientific community. We follow its journey to the present day, accompanying WildOceans' scientists on an expedition to uncover more of their secrets and behaviours.

programme.title: Oceans Africa

programme.title: Wild Portugal

programme.desc: Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.desc: Keith is sent on a mission to destroy a weapon before Galra forces can find it

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Lerk and Thunk hide all the valley's worms in a cave to protect them from the hunters who want to use them as bait; Grug invents the spear and pitches it to the Valley as a tool that will change cavemanity forever!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Click-Clack climbs out of his comfort zone to make sure his ideas are heard when the Dinotrux hatch a plan to stop D-Structs from stealing supplies.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: All the animals are having a nap. But Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo aren't tired and want to play… will they have enough energy to last until everyone else wakes up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is determined that he can copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle… until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just can't whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy is having a party and Raa Raa is helping organise the games. But not everybody is good at them. Can Raa Raa and his friends come up with new games that all the friends are good at and enjoy?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is sure he has found the perfect present for each of his friends… but what happens if the packages get mixed up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is playing a game - copying everyone in the jungle. He soon distracts his friends… but can he put the game to good use?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch can’t keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scooch’s race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil’s perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

programme.title: Tears Of The Sun
programme.desc: In Tears of the Sun, a Navy SEAL team is sent to rescue a doctor in war-torn Nigeria. The mission shifts from extraction to saving refugees as they face brutal rebels while navigating the dangerous jungle.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgement Day
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger reprises his career-changing role as the Terminator in this explosive film that was selected as one of AFI’s Top Ten Sci-Fi films of all time.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Robin Hood in Ridley Scott’s epic reimagining—fighting corruption and sparking a rebellion that turns a humble outlaw into a timeless symbol of freedom.

programme.title: Godzilla Minus One
programme.desc: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: In 2084, construction worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall for a virtual Mars vacation—but the procedure unlocks hidden memories, thrusting him into a deadly rebellion and a secret-agent past.

programme.title: The Mummy (2017)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in The Mummy, a thrilling new take on the legend. When an ancient queen awakens in modern times, she unleashes a terrifying force, sparking a battle across continents.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as tough detective John Kimble in Kindergarten Cop, going undercover as a teacher to find a drug lord's wife. Packed with action, humor, and heart, it’s a classic comedy-thriller.

programme.title: Tai Chi Master
programme.desc: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.

programme.title: Universal Soldier
programme.desc: Two soldiers killed in Vietnam are revived years later as cyborg super-soldiers. But when memories return, they break free—setting up a brutal showdown between former comrades.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Viola Davis stars in an action-packed story of an elite all-female unit of warriors determined to defend their nation.

programme.title: The Man With The Iron Fists
programme.desc: RZA co-writes, directs, and stars in this genre-blending, hip-hop-infused kung fu film set in Hong Kong, featuring Russell Crowe, Lucy Liu, and produced by Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: Back To The Future III
programme.desc: In Back to the Future Part III, Marty travels to 1885 to save Doc from an outlaw. Packed with laughs, action, and heart, it’s the epic Wild West finale to the beloved trilogy.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In Battleship, Earth battles a powerful alien force across sea, sky, and land. Directed by Peter Berg and starring Liam Neeson, Taylor Kitsch, and Rihanna, it's explosive action at sea.

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generations E03 - Turn Of The 20th Century (Part 1)

programme.title: CSI S5 E09 - Mea Culpa
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: The Death Coast

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1)

programme.desc: As the participants get past the shock of being dropped in the wild, the ability to think outside the box proves fruitful to some but a detriment to others.

programme.desc: Tom packs a traditional muzzleloader on a winter deer hunt with Sean and Hank. Jake and Anika complete a successful elk hunt. Aron and Jen cut down dead trees that threaten to destroy their cabin.

programme.title: Buhay Mo'y Buhay Ko Rin
programme.desc: They're both members of the police force: he's an undercover assigned to crack a notorious syndicate, and she's a traffic officer tasked to manage the city's clogged streets.

programme.title: Astig
programme.desc: Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs made their living by putting one over small time con-artists. They became very good at what they were doing so that they were soon recruited into the big-time.

programme.title: Mauna Ka... Susunod Ako!
programme.desc: When Gerry's father Eric dies in the hands of criminal elements, he goes to his father's bestfriend Arthur for guidance.

programme.title: Laging Naroon Ka
programme.desc: Opposites attract. And so they say. When the saintly, introverted Quinito meets the candid, out-going Trixie, there are no sparks flying to great heavens. In fact, both think that there’s just no way they can ever click.

programme.title: Oplan Baleleng
programme.desc: Oplan Baleleng was the name given to a paramilitary group made up of hardened convicts tasked with the rescue of kidnap for ransom victims. In truth though, theirs was a murder mission.

programme.title: Kaliwa't Kanan, Sakit Ng Katawan
programme.desc: Ruben and Lorena are still on their honeymoon stage, but she has already decided to take on family planning the natural way. Disappointed and desperate, he gets into an illicit relationship.

programme.title: Anino Ni David Crusado
programme.desc: Three friends --- Macario (George Estregan), Alvaro (Conrad Poe) and David (Dante Varona) dare to lead the farmers in an uprising against the cruel reign of the Montalvos. But this is cut short as they are ambushed and left to die.

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Pieta 1
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Amanda (Charito Solis) and her unconditional love for her son Rigor (Ace Vergel). Rigor grows up not having to follow any rules and he does not cultivate a conscience. In his dealings with the underworld, he meets syndicate head Johnny Wilson. Will this pave the way for his all-out excursion to evil?

programme.title: Bilang Na Ang Araw Mo
programme.desc: Martin and Rafael were childhood friends who grew up on different sides of the law. Martin became a hired killer, while Rafael turned into a respected defense lawyer.

programme.title: Afuang: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Abner Afuang is an honest to goodness cop who labors to keep the honor of his badge. Fighting ruthless criminals, he has acquired the fury of the syndicates he is fighting.

programme.title: SPO1 Don Juan (Da Dancing Policeman)
programme.desc: Leo Martinez is a policeman who directs traffic with choreographed dance movements. Unknown to him he has a look-alike who takes advantage of his popularity with motorists by directing traffic for get-away cars during robberies.

programme.title: Dapat Ka Bang Mahalin?
programme.desc: The story, which was based on a popular comic’s serial, closely resembled what would later happen in real life to local moviedom's favorite couple. Sharon and Gabby portrayed teenagers who eloped and got married against the advice of everybody.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Dad get stuck on a remote asteroid. // Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom. // Tia's new balloon gets stuck in a tree, so Tim tries to get it down.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Benny perfect a new move in time for the championship volleyball game! // Dora and Boots run into Dulce the dragon on her way to the first day of school and show her that everyone's differences are what make them excellent!

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora stops a frantic octopus Swiper and saves the Pearl Day Party! // Dora meets Raquel the Rock Lobster and helps her get the missing instruments back in time to play at the big music show!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: With Fishmas around the corner, the season's hottest toy- Burpin' Bubbz - is at the top of Baby Shark's and William's wish lists. But when Santa Jaws goes missing, it's up to them to save Fishmas if they're ever going to get their fins on that toy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they can’t see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig’s office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit’s job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig’s job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build a kangaroo safari for Lucas and Lily right in the Bark Yard... until their construction kangaroo hops away! // Speed Meister challenges Rubble & Crew to compete in the ultimate build-off: Builder Cove's first Construction Games!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rocky visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay just in time to see Builder Cove's new baby bear! But when Park Ranger Rose asks for construction help, Speed Meister accidentally ruins the bears' home. It's up to all the pups and Rocky to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help. // The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Digi and Tal's inventions to help a busy Mayor Goodway go haywire. // Mayor Humdinger squeezes himself into the Trekkers' dune buggy race, while his cheating ways put the other racers in jeopardy.

programme.desc: Barbamama and Barbapapa are surprised to see more and more billboards on the road. // Barbalala dreams of becoming a cowgirl and Barbidou is determined to help her.

programme.desc: The 51 Percent is revolving around women and their role in the world. programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.desc: Po (Jack Black) faces his biggest challenge since becoming the Dragon Warrior to lead The Furious Five on a mission of epic proportions and defeat his most threatening rival yet.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Benjamin Button, born in 1918 with the physical state of an elderly man, ages in reverse. He experiences love and break-ups, ecstasy and sorrow, and timelessness by the time he dies in 2003 as a baby.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Elektra unwittingly takes part in her former teacher's test when she protects a former target and his daughter from "The Hand," a sinister crime syndicate of martial arts fighters.

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Detective Dee: The Ghosts in Weird Town
programme.desc: Detective Dee investigates a series of terrifying vampire transformations in Youming Town, uncovering a sinister conspiracy masterminded by Prince Li Zhen, who plots to overthrow the empire. Armed with courage and ingenuity, Dee defeats the bloodthirsty vampires and ultimately exposes the prince’s dark ambitions.

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villa’s dark secrets.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A traveling nurse is pulled over for a traffic violation in New Mexico and is arrested for felony burglary carried out in her home state of Ohio. Is she a thug for hire or innocent with a rock-solid alibi?

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Marjorie's husband, Irv, has recently been diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease and has already taken two dangerous falls in the house where the EMTs could not get to him.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: A brutal double murder shocks Northern California's peace-loving and laid-back Marin County. With residents reeling, police chase an elusive killer through three counties.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: A historic Texan town is stunned when a popular caretaker is found dead and a beloved resident goes missing. But with support from a concerned community, detectives uncover the secrets that led to murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A man in Modesto was apprehended by a K9 unit while fleeing from police; another was arrested while his family dog was bleeding in their backyard.

programme.title: Lie Detector: Truth Or Deception
programme.desc: Years after Gary Coleman’s controversial and tragic death, his ex-wife agrees to take a polygraph test to confront lingering suspicions and silence the rumours that she was responsible for his death.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: 26-year-old Timothy 'Rambo' Ramsey is killed in a drive-by shooting, but the investigation yields little evidence, and the case goes cold for six years.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Lakhvir Singh enjoyed cooking for Lucky Cheema, the man she loved. But when he left her to marry a much younger woman, Singh made the couple a meal that would turn out to be the last Lucky ever tasted.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yétili
programme.desc: Nina and Léon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yétili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yétili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Pétole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Roi Keïta
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keïta's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Roi Keïta
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keïta's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: La Fabuleuse Histoire Des Sciences Au Québec
programme.desc: Any society, however young, inevitably develops a desire to know and understand the history of the land it treads. In 1992, historians and archaeologists were called on to work in close collaboration for the creation of the Pointe-à-Callière Museum, the Montreal Museum of Archaeology and History.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Les Chefs !
programme.desc: Jean-Christophe Poirier, the first Quebec chef awarded a Michelin star, asks the contestants to revisit two French classics with a Quebec twist.

programme.title: Itinéraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Basique, Les Sessions
programme.desc: Young artistes, each from a universe that's as rich as it is diverse, talk about themselves, their careers, their music, their influences...

programme.title: Jacky Caillou
programme.desc: Jacky lives in the Alps with his grandmother, a magnetiser and healer. One day, Elsa seeks out their help for a strange mark spreading over her body. In the region, attacks by wild animals are increasingly frequent. Jacky needs to master the gift passed on to him by his grandmother.

programme.title: Piscine Pro
programme.desc: With a degree in history and civilisation, Charles-Olivier is struggling to find a job in his field. He eventually takes a job as a clerk in a swimming pool shop. With his spirits low, he's getting by as best he can.

programme.title: Le Grand Rendez-Vous De La Fédération Wallonie-Bruxelles 2025
programme.desc: Joëlle Scoriels and Walid are back at the Grand-Place in Brussels to host a high-flying show featuring Belgian talent and pop culture!

programme.title: Le Traditionnel Conte Des Fêtes De Fred Pellerin
programme.desc: Reunion of storyteller Fred Pellerin and conductor Kent Nagano for a 7th symphonic tale. We meet up with the delightful characters from the village of Saint-Élie-de-Caxton. This time, they are looking into the history and mysterious origins of their village.

programme.title: Comme Un Avion
programme.desc: Michel is a computer graphics designer and an avid fan of airmail. One day, he discovers a new passion for kayaking. He decides to buy a kit boat and, encouraged by his wife, Rachelle, heads off on a solo trip. He is soon meeting more and more people along the river.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Débat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.desc: Jean-Christophe Poirier, the first Quebec chef awarded a Michelin star, asks the contestants to revisit two French classics with a Quebec twist.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Femi Akanho, alias Femi the Scorpion, is a dancer and choreographer from Benin who, despite familial opposition, trained discreetly since childhood. When he arrrived in France in 2016, he choreographed for the Opéra Garnier and the Théâtre de Chaillot, while continuing to dance in the street, to bring everyone together.

programme.title: Comment Ça Va Le Nord ?
programme.desc: With only four hours of sunshine per day, winter in the Far North is particularly harmful for the environment as fossil fuels, such as diesel or propane, continue to provide the main source of electricity. Finding new ways of doing things is becoming crucial...

programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc: Yvan Hallouin walks around Paris and its surroundings. In each stroll, the soul and identity of the 'City of Light' are examined through encounters with the local inhabitants and historical anecdotes.

programme.title: 100 % Pur Poils
programme.desc: This is one of Europe's most famous animal parks. The zoo at La Barben, near Aix-en-Provence, is a benchmark in species conservation and acts as a refuge for animals that have been seized or abandoned. Visit with Louis Pons and Adeline Godefroy.

programme.title: L'Épicerie
programme.desc: The place to be for all those who are interested in what they put on their plates and all things relating to food. The programme: reports, surveys, taste tests, test benches, answers to questions from television viewers, including advice and simple but effective tricks.
